entries.title_d: Some freighters with repair droids for the Rori Station are enroute. Your mission is to provide a safe escort for them. When you feel that you have exhausted your ship or yourself, you can return to base at anytime.
entries.title: Naboo System: Protect Shipments of Repair Droids Duty
entries.thanks_5: Suddenly, I'm not so worried anymore. You're a monster of a fighter pilot!
entries.thanks_4: They'll have to do a bit better than that with you around, good job pilot!
entries.thanks_2: Lets keep moving before more of them show up!
entries.taunt_5: Spare no one and stop that freighter!
entries.taunt_4: Failure is not possible against a novice like you.
entries.taunt_3: Cut your engines immediately and we will spare your lives!
entries.taunt_2: And I thought this was going to be another boring shift!
entries.shields_depleted: Our shields are depleted pilot, this will get ugly!
entries.reason_5: Greetings pilot, glad that you are here. Lets get moving.
entries.reason_4: We're ready to leave this system, lets go.
entries.reason_3: Good to see you pilot, lets not waste any time.
entries.reason_2: This shipment is marked as urgent... lets get it there on time.
entries.reason_1: Alright, lets get out of here.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: One of the freighters have provided us with these coordinates as rally point. Get there quickly pilot.
entries.quest_location_d: The Naboo System is a hotbed of activity these days. Watch your back... you never know who will take an interest in these shipments.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the freighter to a location where they can deliver their shipment in safety. Stay alert and good luck.
entries.panic_4: I didn't think we could slip out undetected.
entries.panic_3: Everyone strap in, this is going to get bumpy!
entries.panic_2: I hope you're as good as we were told.
entries.panic_1: Time to prove your worth pilot.
entries.hull_half: Sensors show multiple hull breaches! You need to get these fighters off us!
entries.goodbye_5: We're ready to make our delivery, thanks for providing a solid escort pilot.
entries.goodbye_4: That was fun! Want to do it again? Just kidding, thanks again pilot!
entries.goodbye_3: That was fun! Want to do it again? Just kidding, thanks again pilot!
entries.goodbye_2: Well that was a rush! See you around pilot.
entries.goodbye_1: Making the delivery. Thank you for the help pilot.
entries.found_loc: One of the freighters will meet you at this location, get over there as fast as you can pilot.
entries.failed_protect: The freighter was forced to perform an emergency hyperspace jump, you better pray that they are alright pilot. Return to base!
entries.failed_destroy: You let them intecept our shipment pilot! Return to base immediately!
entries.complete: Good job pilot, they are safe. Stand by for further orders.
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < Sensors indicate no more fighter vessels with armed weapon systems in area. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Vessels on intercept course approaching, weapon systems armed. >
entries.arrived_at_loc: The freighter is almost there, stand by.
entries.abort: You can't abort now, we're not safe yet!
